attributes.action: Disolve parliament to enable a new breed of politician to clean up the distasteful and obscene actions of some members with regards to their expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
there are instances of the misuse of expenses that border on what would be classed as fraud outside the priviliged houses of parliament.
the present goverment is completely out of touch and even a new socialist goverment would be better than the exixting one

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
